class  DzDctVertex
 Represents a vertex that has discontinuous data in a vertex map. This class implemented 'explicitly shared' data for for the discontinuous vertex. This means that copying, or assignment operations are very efficient. This also means that all copies of a data item reference the same data, if one is changed, they are all changed. The method deepCopy creates and returns a deep copy of the dctVertex that does not share the same data. More...

class  DzVertexMap
 Implements a map with one value per vertex, as well as supporting discontinuous values. This class maps an arbitrary numeric value to a vertex in the geometry. It should always contain at a minimum one value per vertex. It also supports discontinuous vertex maps - where different facets can have diferent values for the same vertex. More...
